title: Contours Curve V2 Convertible Tandem Double Baby Stroller & Toddler Stroller - 360 Turns, Easy Handling Over Curbs, Removable and Reversible Seats, Infant Car Seat Compatibility - Black Herringbone
features: V2 UPGRADES: The V2 version includes a few new features like a height-adjustable handle and an improved easy-lift seat design to make it even easier to reverse the seats while on the go

EASY STEERING AND 360 TURNING: 360 turning as easy as a single stroller. Innovative 6-wheel design provides superior maneuverability for narrow store aisles and tight turn radius to navigate busy streets and compact elevators
EASY HANDLING OVER CURBS: Unique design specifically engineered to perform with the weight of two children, the curb-assist feature facilitates easy handling over curbs

VERSATILE SEATING OPTIONS: Removable and reversible seats with lift-assist mounts for multiple seating options. Accommodates up to 2 infant Car Seats. Brand specific click-in adapters and universal car seat adapters available for purchase separately

COMFORTABLE SEATS: Sonic welded, water-resistant seats. UPF 50+ canopies with zipper-mesh expansion, peek-a-boo windows. Each seat can hold children up to 40 lbs (18.14 kg) and 40 in (1 m) in height and recline to almost flat. (both seats included)
description: The easiest way to stroll with two is now even better! Whether cruising through the burbs or sightseeing in the city, the Contours Curve V2 makes strolling with two children a breeze. Our unique 6-wheel design makes steering and 360° turning as easy as a single stroller. Specifically engineered to perform with the weight of two children, this stroller glides, pushes and turns effortlessly with one hand. In addition, the curb-assist feature facilitates easy handling over curbs. The V2 version includes a few new features like a height-adjustable handle and an improved easy-lift seat design to make it even easier to reverse the seats while on the go. Compatible with two infant car seats (car seat adapters sold separately), its easy to transport twins, and when they get older, the stadium-style seating makes it easier for both to see the sights with plenty of room between the seats for little legs. Turn and spin on a dime with the Contours Curve V2! Our Contours Baby team is dedicated to going above industry standards when it comes to product testing.

From little moments to big adventures, Contours Baby helps you make the most of family time with products that combine style and function to fit your family’s unique journey. Family owned and operated, we are a part of a company that has been actively engaged in developing baby products for more than 75 years. Designing high-quality products has always been our focus at Contours Baby but creating value and trust with our consumers and our global community is at the core of our DNA.
